snippet.title: Nightmare Zapping Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Link: https://maldo19.itch.io/nightmare-zapping

Nightmare Zapping is a horror game where you watch a TV that shows things that happen to different people in a cursed city where everyone is destined to meet their end. Explore the channels and find what is the cause behind their demise.

This game was made in a few months as a test for a small framework I made, if the game has a good reception I may update it with more content for a paid release. If you enjoyed playing this, please leave a rating/comment so I know if you all enjoyed it.

As always, thank you for playing and giving this game a chance, I hope you enjoy it!
